Header.title: We are Blocks
Header.paragraph: A globally encrypted, decentralized file sharing platform

About.paragraph: Users can upload files/images to Blocks with peace of mind that your sensitive data will soon be secure, uncensorable and shareable.  Security in Blocks comes from the decentralized process through the Ethereum Blockchain. Through this process,  your files will be safely stored in the IPFS (The InterPlanetary File System) utilizing Solidity Smart Contracts, into a unique hash password that can be shared via text or email.

Testimonials.text: Blocks is great for America. Blocks we can!
Testimonials.name: Barack Obama

Testimonials.text: Blocks solves our problems with the get from A to B
Testimonials.name: Albert Einstein

Testimonials.text: I just have one thing to say: Can you smell what the block is cooking?
Testimonials.name: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson

Testimonials.text: Real change, enduring change, happens one block at a time
Testimonials.name: (The Notorious) RBG

Testimonials.text: Pokemon evolves into Blocks of themselves. And now so can you.
Testimonials.name: Detective Pikachu, PI

Features.title: Account
Features.text: Create user account. We don't store any personal information or data.

Features.title: Files
Features.text: Your files are encrypted and stored on IPFS's decentralized platform

Features.title: Stay Secure
Features.text: Keep your files private with multiple layers of proetection

Features.title: Share
Features.text: Quickly send any file - big or small
